resources.string: At least one day must be selected. Use checkboxes at the right
1. Zoom in/out to change size of a scale.
2. Scroll up/down to move the zoomed scale.
3. Double-tap on a free space to add a new interval here.
4. Long tap on an interval to toggle it\'s edit mode.
5. When span is in edit mode you can drag it by it\'s middle to move the whole interval or drag by vertical edges (toucheable areas are indicated by arrows) to change the bounds of an interval.
6. When span is in edit use double tap on it to delete.
